channel.title: Canon rock?
channel.description:
Well I figured why not start a thread like this up again. This song is still very popular and quite the challenge. Anyone here try learning this song on guitar? its insanely hard and I started learning it over a year ago and even thought I memorized the tab and can play through song but not near recording it.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=by8oyJztzwo&feature=channel_page

item.title: Canon rock?
item.dc:creator: @_Vengeance _Vengeance
item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

Protip: Learn to sweep and you’ll be fine…
Also, learn your C major scale.
